block.p: Sarah Brett Mooney, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John E. Mooney of Rochester, was married there yesterday to Richard Stanley Holland, a son of Mr. and Mrs. R. Calvin Holland of Charlotte, N.C. The Rev. William Donnelly performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at St. Mary's Church.

Mrs. Holland, 29, is an associate product manager in New York with the Colgate-Palmolive Company. She graduated from Hamilton College and received an M.B.A. from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Her father is the chief executive of Essex Partners, a real estate development and hotel management company in Rochester.

Sarah Brett Mooney, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John E. Mooney of Rochester, was married there yesterday to Richard Stanley Holland, a son of Mr. and Mrs. R. Calvin Holland of Charlotte, N.C. The Rev. William Donnelly performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at St. Mary's Church.

Mrs. Holland, 29, is an associate product manager in New York with the Colgate-Palmolive Company. She graduated from Hamilton College and received an M.B.A. from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Her father is the chief executive of Essex Partners, a real estate development and hotel management company in Rochester.

Mr. Holland, 36, is known as Stan. He is a vice president for corporate finance at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter in New York. He graduated from Duke University and received law and M.B.A. degrees from Chapel Hill. His father is the chief executive of the Holland Companies, real estate developers in Charlotte.
